quiz.title: Calculus Implicit Function Rule (Quiz 11)
quiz.subtitle: Implicit Function Rule Differentiation Practice (10 Questions)
quiz.subject: Calculus

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(xy + \sin y = x^2\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: y + x·dy/dx + cos y·dy/dx = 2x → (x + cos y)·dy/dx = 2x - y → dy/dx = (2x - y)/(x + cos y)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^2 + y^2 + xy = 7\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2x + 2y·dy/dx + y + x·dy/dx = 0 → (x + 2y)·dy/dx = -(2x + y) → dy/dx = -(2x + y)/(x + 2y)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(e^{xy} = x + y\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: e^(xy)(y + x·dy/dx) = 1 + dy/dx → ye^(xy) + xe^(xy)·dy/dx = 1 + dy/dx → (xe^(xy) - 1)·dy/dx = 1 - ye^(xy) → dy/dx = (1 - ye^(xy))/(xe^(xy) - 1)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(\sin(x + y) = xy\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: cos(x+y)(1 + dy/dx) = y + x·dy/dx → cos(x+y) + cos(x+y)·dy/dx = y + x·dy/dx → (cos(x+y) - x)·dy/dx = y - cos(x+y) → dy/dx = (y - cos(x+y))/(cos(x+y) - x)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(\ln(xy) = x + y\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: (1/x + 1/y·dy/dx) = 1 + dy/dx → 1/x + (1/y)·dy/dx = 1 + dy/dx → (1/y - 1)·dy/dx = 1 - 1/x → dy/dx = (1 - 1/x)/(1/y - 1) = (y(x-1))/(x(1-y))

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(y\cos x = x\sin y\)
options: \(\frac{\sin y + y\sin x}{\cos x - x\cos y}\)
\(\frac{\sin y - y\sin x}{\cos x + x\cos y}\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: -y·sin x + cos x·dy/dx = sin y + x·cos y·dy/dx → cos x·dy/dx - x·cos y·dy/dx = sin y + y·sin x → (cos x - x·cos y)·dy/dx = sin y + y·sin x → dy/dx = (sin y + y·sin x)/(cos x - x·cos y)

questions.question: Find \(\frac{dy}{dx}\) if \(x^2 + e^y = xy\)
questions.explanation: Differentiate both sides: 2x + e^y·dy/dx = y + x·dy/dx → e^y·dy/dx - x·dy/dx = y - 2x → (e^y - x)·dy/dx = y - 2x → dy/dx = (y - 2x)/(e^y - x)

scoreMessages.90: Excellent work! You have mastered advanced implicit differentiation.
scoreMessages.70: Good job! You understand most implicit differentiation concepts but could use some review.
scoreMessages.50: Not bad! Review the implicit differentiation applications you missed and try again.
scoreMessages.0: Keep practicing! Focus on understanding implicit differentiation with product, chain, and trigonometric rules.
